attributes.additional_details: After the riots . The only solutions to deal with this is to bring back some respect & the only way to deal with these hooligans is to teach them some lessons on manors appreceiatins & others. We are loosing to many people in the army for these idiots to appreciates. Is by time they should learn respect & tax payees had enough to fit the bill all the time.please bring back national service.  Please support this if we want a good country to be proud of
